channel.title: Oculus-RS BrandNEW Rsps|| Fast Rising Community!
channel.description:
[SIZE=6][CENTER][URL=http://"http://oculus-rs.org/"]Website[/URL] || [URL=http://"http://oculus-rs.org/forums/"]Forums[/URL] || [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/782l34189pfz9q6/Oculus-RS.jar?dl=1"]Client[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ulY7Zoa.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=6][CENTER][URL=http://"http://oculus-rs.org/"]Website[/URL] || [URL=http://"http://oculus-rs.org/forums/"]Forums[/URL] || [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/782l34189pfz9q6/Oculus-RS.jar?dl=1"]Client[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/B]
All features listed are working, 100% playable and live at the time of writing unless marked with a (*) in which case the marked features are partly working and still being actively developed, but are live and available for testing. Please note that some features are listed twice due to difficulty with categorization. We also have a lot of potential updates being tested that are not listed here. [B] General[/B] - Starter Packs - Loyalty Points (Auras) - Fist of Guthix Tokens (Pking Rewards) - Crystal Chest (Treasure Trail Items,Animal Masks,Mobilising Armies Robes) - Squeal of Fortune - Vote For Spins - Highscores - Friends List - Private Chat - Commands - Hairdresser - Makeovers - Skill Capes - Special Attacks - Donator Zone - Max Cape - Completionist Cape
[B]Dungeons[/B] - Kuradal’s Dungeon - Jadinko Lair* - Polypore Dungeon - Cave Horror Dungeon - Glacor's Dungeon - Ice Strykwyrms dungeon
[B]Bosses[/B] - Bandos Godwars - Zamorak Godwars - Armadyl Godwars - Saradomin Godwars - King Black Dragon - Queen Black Dragon - Corporeal Beast - Tormented Demons - Nex - Barrows
[B]Minigames[/B] - Wilderness (PKing) - Clan Wars ( White/Red/Purple portal) - Fight Caves (Fire Cape) - Barrows - Fight Kiln (Tokhaar-Kal) - Castle Wars - Dominion Tower
[B]Melee[/B] - Bronze, Iron, Steel, Black, Mithril, Adamant, Rune Armour & Weapons - All Dragon Weapons - Full Dragon and Dragonbone Armour Set - Barrows Weapons/Armour Sets - God Weapons/Armour Sets - Chaotic Weapons - Defenders - Dominion Sword - Goliath Gloves - Ganodermic Armour [B] Prayer[/B] - All Prayers - Gilded Altar - Curses [B] Magic[/B] - Ancients (Barrage) - Ghostly Robes - Ancient Staff - Lunars (Vengeance) - God Capes& Staffs - Mystic Robes - Infinity Robes - Grifolic robes - Fungal robes - Staff of Light - Chaotic Staff - Dominion Staff
[B]Ranged[/B] - Bows & Arrows - Crossbows & Dragon Bolts - Karil’s Xbow & Bolt Racks - Hand Cannon & shots - Chaotic Crossbow - Dominion Crossbow - Leather/Dragonhide Armour Sets
[B]Summoning[/B] - All Familiars - Obelisks
[B]Slayer[/B] - Tasks - Slayer Tower - Kuradal’s Dungeon - Strykwyrms ( Ice , Jungle & Desert) - Cave Horrors - Ganodermic Beasts - Glacors
[B]Agility[/B] - Gnome Agility Course - Barbarian Agility Course (Basic and Advanced) - Shortcuts
[B]Runecrafting[/B] - All Altars
[B]Mining[/B] - Smelting Bars / Smithing Equipment - Copper, Tin, Iron, Coal, Gold, Mithril, Adamant & Runite Ores - Living Rock Caverns
[B]Woodcutting[/B] - Trees (Normal, Oak, Willow, Maple, Yew, Magic) - Choking Ivys [B] Fletching[/B] - Bow Fletching - Bow Stringing* - Bolt Fletching
[B]Firemaking[/B] - Bonfire
[B]Crafting[/B] - Gem Cutting - Tanning - Dragonhide Armour Crafting
[B]Fishing[/B] - Fly Fishing - Cage Fishing - Harpoon Fishing
[B]Thieving[/B] - 12 Stalls
[B]Herblore[/B] - Stat Boosting Potions - Restorative Potions - Extreme Potions - Overloads
[B]Farming[/B] - Vegetable Patch,Hops,Trees & Herb Seeds [B] Hunter [/B] - Bird Traps - Box Traps ( Red Chinchompas)
[B]Construction [/B] - Chairs - Trapdoors - Demonic Thrones - Bed - Dresser - Fire Place
Media [spoiler][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U2lgrT8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4G1L1kK.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MzPrT6z.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ll6dWp9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/96BOc7J.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LyrXIHz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vW7MzUT.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NaahBND.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
Come and check the fast rising RSPS of the year!

item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

Elrick:

Safety settings blocked me from using the webclient. Also, you say you have 100 people playing, yet your forums have 2 people registered. Pass.

Attr[quote=“wimstr, post:2, topic:546689”]very very nice.
I’ll check this out for sure. :D[/quote]action

tyvm! see yeah ingame ^^

come and join the fast rising 718 RSPS

[B][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/B]

All features listed are working, 100% playable and live at the time of writing unless marked with a (*) in which case the marked features are partly working and still being actively developed, but are live and available for testing. Please note that some features are listed twice due to difficulty with categorization. We also have a lot of potential updates being tested that are not listed here.
[B]
General[/B]

  • Starter Packs
  • Loyalty Points (Auras)
  • Fist of Guthix Tokens (Pking Rewards)
  • Crystal Chest (Treasure Trail Items,Animal Masks,Mobilising Armies Robes)
  • Squeal of Fortune
  • Vote For Spins
  • Highscores
  • Friends List
  • Private Chat
  • Commands
  • Hairdresser
  • Makeovers
  • Skill Capes
  • Special Attacks
  • Donator Zone
  • Max Cape
  • Completionist Cape

[B]Dungeons[/B]

  • Kuradal’s Dungeon
  • Jadinko Lair*
  • Polypore Dungeon
  • Cave Horror Dungeon
  • Glacor’s Dungeon
  • Ice Strykwyrms dungeon

[B]Bosses[/B]

  • Bandos Godwars
  • Zamorak Godwars
  • Armadyl Godwars
  • Saradomin Godwars
  • King Black Dragon
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • Corporeal Beast
  • Tormented Demons

  • Barrows

[B]Minigames[/B]

  • Wilderness (PKing)

  • Fight Caves (Fire Cape)
  • Barrows
  • Fight Kiln (Tokhaar-Kal)
  • Castle Wars
  • Dominion Tower

[B]Melee[/B]

  • Bronze, Iron, Steel, Black, Mithril, Adamant, Rune Armour & Weapons
  • All Dragon Weapons
  • Full Dragon and Dragonbone Armour Set
  • Barrows Weapons/Armour Sets
  • God Weapons/Armour Sets
  • Chaotic Weapons
  • Defenders
  • Dominion Sword
  • Goliath Gloves
  • Ganodermic Armour
    [B]
    Prayer[/B]
  • All Prayers
  • Gilded Altar
  • Curses
    [B]
    Magic[/B]
  • Ancients (Barrage)
  • Ghostly Robes

  • God Capes& Staffs
  • Mystic Robes
  • Infinity Robes

  • Fungal robes

  • Chaotic Staff
  • Dominion Staff

[B]Ranged[/B]

  • Bows & Arrows

  • Karil’s Xbow & Bolt Racks
  • Hand Cannon & shots
  • Chaotic Crossbow
  • Dominion Crossbow

  • Ganodermic Beasts

[B]Agility[/B]

  • Gnome Agility Course
  • Barbarian Agility Course (Basic and Advanced)
  • Shortcuts

[B]Runecrafting[/B]

  • All Altars

[B]Mining[/B]

  • Smelting Bars / Smithing Equipment
  • Copper, Tin, Iron, Coal, Gold, Mithril, Adamant & Runite Ores
  • Living Rock Caverns

[B]Woodcutting[/B]

  • Trees (Normal, Oak, Willow, Maple, Yew, Magic)
  • Choking Ivys
    [B]
    Fletching[/B]
  • Bow Fletching
  • Bow Stringing*
  • Bolt Fletching

[B]Firemaking[/B]

[B]Crafting[/B]

  • Gem Cutting

[B]Fishing[/B]

  • Cage Fishing
